channel.title: 16 errors when i compile :/
channel.description:
when i compile my client these errors show up :/
[code]Applet_Sub1.java:7: cannot find symbol symbol: class applet public class Applet_Sub1 extends applet ^ Applet_Sub1.java:23: method12(java.lang.Runnable,int) in Applet_Sub1 cannot be a pplied to (Applet_Sub1,int) method12(this, 1); ^ Applet_Sub1.java:34: method12(java.lang.Runnable,int) in Applet_Sub1 cannot be a pplied to (Applet_Sub1,int) method12(this, 1); ^ Applet_Sub1.java:40: addMouseListener(java.awt.event.MouseListener) in java.awt. Component cannot be applied to (Applet_Sub1) method11(0).addMouseListener(this); ^ Applet_Sub1.java:41: addMouseMotionListener(java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener) in java.awt.Component cannot be applied to (Applet_Sub1) method11(0).addMouseMotionListener(this); ^ Applet_Sub1.java:42: addKeyListener(java.awt.event.KeyListener) in java.awt.Comp onent cannot be applied to (Applet_Sub1) method11(0).addKeyListener(this); ^ Applet_Sub1.java:43: addFocusListener(java.awt.event.FocusListener) in java.awt. Component cannot be applied to (Applet_Sub1) method11(0).addFocusListener(this); ^ Applet_Sub1.java:45: addWindowListener(java.awt.event.WindowListener) in java.aw t.Window cannot be applied to (Applet_Sub1) aFrame_Sub1_15.addWindowListener(this); ^ Applet_Sub1.java:487: incompatible types found : Applet_Sub1 required: java.awt.Component return this; ^ client.java:2398: cannot find symbol symbol : method method12(client,int) location: class client method12(this, 2); ^ client.java:2548: cannot find symbol symbol : method getAppletContext() location: class Applet_Sub1 return super.getAppletContext(); ^ client.java:2553: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(byte[],client) location: class Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Su b1(abyte0, this); ^ client.java:4729: incompatible types found : client required: java.awt.Component return this; ^ client.java:5706: cannot find symbol symbol : method getDocumentBase() location: class Applet_Sub1 return super.getDocumentBase().getHost().toLowerCase(); ^ client.java:7314: cannot find symbol symbol : method getCodeBase() location: class Applet_Sub1 return super.getCodeBase(); ^ client.java:9181: cannot find symbol symbol : method getParameter(java.lang.String) location: class Applet_Sub1 return super.getParameter(s); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 16 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
can somone please help me fix them
holdenfreak1@hotmail.com is my email :)
